濓字的基本解释

濓
lián
〔濓江〕在中国江西省南部，流入贡水。
〔濓溪〕水名。a.在中国湖南省道县；b.在中国江西省九江市。

濓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lián］
［《廣韻》勒兼切，平添，來。］
亦作“濓1”。
(1)浅水。
(2)水名。濂水，今名濂江，在江西省南部。参阅清顾祖禹《读史方舆纪要·江西六·赣州府》。
(3)学派名。参见“濂洛關閩”。

濓字的康熙字典解释
濓字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
濓字的起名意思

暂无。

Slap
Basic explanation of words
Slap
lián
[Zijiang] flows into Gongshui in the southern part of Jiangxi Province, China.
[Laixi] The name of the water. a. Daoxian County, Hunan Province, China; b. Jiujiang City, Jiangxi Province, China.
Slap
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lián］
["Guangyun" Le Jianqie, add on, come. ]
Also known as "濓1".
(1) Shallow water.
(2) Water name. Lianshui, now known as Lianjiang, is in the south of Jiangxi Province. Refer to Qing Gu Zuyu's "Minutes of Reading History and Fangyu·Jiangxi Six·Ganzhou Mansion".
(3) School name. See "Lianluoguan Min".

Name meaning
Nothing.
lián
1) 〔～江〕在中国江西省南部，流入贡水。
2) 〔～溪〕水名。
a) 在中国湖南省道县；
b) 在中国江西省九江市。
